JobFullDesc: The Facebook Developer Operations team is looking for a strong leader and team player to support our growing team. This individual will support a new functional team focused on audit & compliance. In this position, you will interface closely with cross-functional stakeholders across Developer Operations, Privacy, Legal, Product Policy, and Compliance teams. Successful candidates for this team have a bias toward action, strong attention to detail, enjoy finding patterns amid chaos, making quick decisions, and are up for a challenge. The Audit & Compliance Manager is a passionate connector and diligent problem solver. We want an experienced people manager with program manager skills who is ambitious yet humble and knows how to get comfortable in uncomfortable situations. You will improve team communication, collaboration, and remove roadblocks through utilization of a full range of organizational and interpersonal skills. Most importantly, they will be able to lead and provide support for a team of project managers, including developing new and streamlining existing processes and providing career coaching and professional development for individual team members.
